settings.text: At Gentle, our mission is simple: to provide premium beauty and wellness products that inspire confidence and promote self-care. Join us on your journey to look and feel amazing.

custom_css: /* Text overlay button */.hero__btn {background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); color: #ffffff; border-radius: 5px; padding: 10px 20px; margin-top: 10px; position: absolute; bottom: 85px; left: 0; right: 0; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: fit-content;}

settings.title: Charlotte F.
settings.text: Hey there! Just had to share my love for Gentle's Airstyler. It's seriously amazing! This 21-year-old girl is obsessed with the waves it gives me. And the quality? Top-notch. It's a total game-changer. Girl, you need this in your life!

settings.title: Samantha J.
settings.text: Hear me out girl! I had to share my excitement about Gentle's Blackhead Remover. Seriously, it's amazing! As a girl struggling with stubborn blackheads, this little gem has been a lifesaver. After just a few uses, my blackheads vanished. It's easy, painless, and super effective. If you're dealing with pesky blackheads, you need this in your life!

settings.title: Heaver W.
settings.text: Gentles-Skin Improver, was it worth it? Seriously, it's incredible! After just a month, my jawline looks like this. I'm beyond thrilled with the results! If you're looking to enhance your jawline and feel more confident, you need to try Gentle's Skin Improver my girl. It will change your life forever!

settings.subheading: Hey everyone, I wanted to talk about Gentle's Airstyler. Honestly, it's incredible. I'm completely hooked on the waves it creates. And let me tell you, the quality is unbeatable. Trust me, you won't regret adding this to your routine.

Hey, listen up! I need to tell you about Gentle's Blackhead Remover. I'm not kidding, it's incredible! Dealing with stubborn blackheads has been a real hassle for me, but this product changed everything. Within a few uses, those pesky blackheads were gone. It's simple to use, painless, and effective. If you're struggling with blackheads, trust me, this is a must-have!
